sourceDesc.p: Klaus Wille, “Buddhist Sanskrit Sources from Khotan,” in: Buddhist Manuscripts from Central Asia: The British Library Sanskrit Fragments, Volume II.1 (Texts), ed. by Seishi KARASHIMA and Klaus WILLE, Tokyo: The International Research Institute for Advanced Buddhology at Soka University, 2009, pp. 25-72.

encodingDesc.editorialDecl: Input and marked up by IRIAB.

head.p: This catalogue contains transliterations of Sanskrit fragments in the Stein Collection at the British Library.

msItem.title: Śūraṃgamasamādhisūtra
msItem.note: Early South Turkestan Brāhmī; almost illegible; to the same folio belongs an unnumbered Stein fragment (IOL San 529); ed. Wille 2006 (BLSF I), pp. 51-53 (frg. 179)

msItem.title: Larger Prajñāpāramitā text?
msItem.note: Cf., i.e., AsP(V), p. 82.3-25(?) and PvsP(K)2 3, pp. 140f.; South Turkestan Brāhmī (main type)
msItem.q:
a /// + + + + .. .. + + + + ///
b /// + + + .. .. [n]ā[bodhis](a)[tv]. ///
c /// + tad avocat* yad bha[danta] .. ///
d /// .. piṇḍīkṛtvābhisaṃkṣipyā.r. ///
e /// danta bhagavann agrānumo[da] .. ///
f /// + [s](u)[bhū]ti ◯ m etad avo[c](at*) ///
g /// + + + ◯ m arhatāṃ .. + ///
h /// + + + + + + .. [lo] + + ///

a /// + + + + + .. .[ṣ]. + + + /// 
b /// +
                            + ◯ tye[ka]bu[d]dh. + /// 
c /// + + .. ◯ t ku[ś]alamū+
                            ///

e /// [d] (e)vam a[nu]modayitavyā.. /// 
f
                            /// [d]ā[na]pāramitā[y]āva[t pr](ajñā) /// 
g /// +
                            [y](a)[th]āvim[u]kti[s t](a)thā.. /// 
h /// + + + +
                            balā.. + + .. ///

msItem.title: Saddharmapuṇḍarīkasūtra
msItem.note: + Or.15001/22. South Turkestan Brāhmī (main type); Parallels: Ka 358a7 359b1; Or.8212/26(2) rz (Kha.i.199, ed. Wille 2006, frg. 171); KN 372.2-373.3

a /// prati[labdh]. + + ///
b /// paribuddhvā+ + ///
c /// m api saṃ[vat]. ///
d/// sm. .. + + ///

msItem.q:
d /// + .. ///
e /// .. ni ◯ ///
f /// kanirukti ///
g /// [ha]sramahā ///

msItem.q:

b /// nuvicinta ///

d /// [t]i ◯ ///

bhijñāḥ pratilap[s](ya) ///
tasya [n]i .. + + ///
darśa [d]. + + ///
maṃ dharma .. + + ///

msItem.title: Larger Prajñāpāramitā text
msItem.note: cf. LPG 16r5-18r9, ŚSP 114.3-121.9f.; Early South Turkestan Brāhmī; Buddha images in circles (= ◎ ) mark end of chapter 1 in recto and of chapter 2 in verso; 1) Kha. i. 220 (Or.8212/174) and 2) SI P/19(3) belong to the same MS.
msItem.q:
a /// + [vyam* k]i[m]. .. .. + + + + + + + + + ///
b /// + sādhu .. .. .. + + + + + + + + ///
c /// sa[ha ś]r(a)[v](a) .. + + + + + + + + + ///
d /// + va[r]t[o n]āma pra .. + + + ◎ ///
e /// [bh](a)van[t]i catvāro mahā+ + + ◎ ///
f /// samyaksa[ṃ]bud[dh]ānaṃ [pyel]aṃ [y]. .. ◎ ///
g /// + .. yaṃ pa .. .. .. nti [dev]y[ā] k[ā] ◎ ///
h /// + + .[i] .ā+ + + kk[r]apravartana[t]ā ◎ ///
i /// + + + + + + + [ku]la[duh]i[taraś] ca vayam eta ///
j /// + + + + + + + [n]a me[thuna]saṃyogena bodhi ///
k /// + + + + + + + .. [antar]āya ka[ḥ] punar upā///
l /// + + + + + + + .. evam ukta ā[yuṣ]mā[ṃ ś]. ///
m /// + + + + + + + [va]m u[kt]o bhagavāṃ āyuṣma ///
n /// + + + + + + + [tpā]dam [u]pādāyā[bra] .. ///
o /// + + + + + + + .. .. .. ye .[o] .. + + ///
p /// + + + + + + + + + + .. s[u]śi + + + ///

p /// + + + + [nupa]śyate + + + + + + + + ///

msItem.title: Larger Prajñāpāramitā text
msItem.note: cf., i.e., PvsP(K)6-8, pp. 130.26-131.26 and AdsP(C) II, p. 107.1-108.5; South Turkestan Brāhmī (main type)
msItem.q:
a /// .. h. pra[tye] ///
b /// .. karā[śau] ///
c /// [th](a)maci[tt]au ///

msItem.title: Saddharmapuṇḍarīkasūtra
msItem.note: to the same folio belong SHT 4447 + Otani SLLMC A-6 + Or.15001/25 (r5-8/v4-7) + Or.15001/12 (r10-11/v1-2) + Or.15001/14; Early South Turkestan Brāhmī; Parallels: Ka 186a5 188a5; SHT 4303, frg. 48r2 49v5 [ed. Wille 2000]; Wa 94.32 97.5; Toda 1979, pp. 271f. (folio Lévi A5-11); Toda 1988, pp.3 4 (fol. 4a5 5a4); KN 193.1 196.9
msItem.q:
8 + .. + [hu] (p)rāṇako[ṭ]a
9 .. [na]smi adhi[k]āra ku[rv].
10 .āni 27 tasya jinas[y].
11 .i .i .. prāptāṃ ca tai b[o]

msItem.title: Saddharmapuṇḍarīkasūtra
msItem.note: to the same folio belong Or.15001/11, 14, 25, 35; see Wille2009(1): 39-40 [Or.15001/11]

msItem.title: Saddharmapuṇḍarīkasūtra
msItem.note: South Turkestan Brāhmī (main type); Parallels: Wa 4.27; KN 5.7-7.3; Ka 11b6-15a1
msItem.q:
sṛbhiḥ parṣadbhiḥ [par]i[v]ṛ///
ntaṃ mahāvaipulyam bo[dh]i .. + ///
dhiṃ sam[āpanno ’bh]. .. + + ///
maye ma .. + + + + ///
par[ṣ](a) .[o] + + + + + + ///
tena + + + + + + + ///

u s ti[ṣṭhaṃ] + + + + + + + + ///

w ye ca teṣ[u] .. .. + + ///

y nirvṛtānāṃ buddhānā.. ///
z m[ittaṃ] prātihāryaṃ bat[e]daṃ ta .. ///

msItem.note: to the same folio belong Or.15001/11, 12, 25, 35; see Wille2009(1): 39-40 [Or.15001/11]

msItem.note: South Turkestan Brāhmī (main type); Parallels: Ka 362a3 b6; KN 376.7-377.5(?)

msItem.title: Dhāraṇī text
msItem.note: South Turkestan Brāhmī (main type); To the same MS may belong Kha. i. 213 (Or.8212/65) and IOL 17B (folio 1, 2nd row, 2nd from the right).

msItem.title: Dhāraṇī text

msItem.note: South Turkestan Brāhmī (main type); in the middle stitched together with a thread

msItem.title: Larger Prajñāpāramitā text
msItem.note: cf., i.e., PvsP(K)2-3, pp. 71f. and AsP(V) 37.16-38.21; South Turkestan Brāhmī (main type); two fragments of Or.8212/70 (Kha. 0042. b, c) belong to the same MS.
msItem.q:
1 /// thāloke praj[ñ]āya[nt]e .. + + + +
2 /// yac ca bodhisa[tva]sya mahā[satva](sya)
3 /// leṇa samanvāgato bodhisatvo [m](ahā)
4 /// [vam ā] .. + + .y. tāyāṃ
5 /// [n]eṣu caramā

msItem.note: cf., i.e., PvsP(K)6-8, pp. 128.25-130.4 and AdsP(C) II 104.28-106.2; South Turkestan Brāhmī (main type)

msItem.note: to the same folio belong Or.15001/11, 12, 14, 35; see Wille2009(1): 39-40 [Or.15001/11]

msItem.title: Buddhanāmasūtra
msItem.note: South Turkestan Brāhmī (main type); Parallels: cf. SI P/61 frg. br1-v5 (ed. BB 34, p. 288, No.8; cf. von Hinüber 1991, p. 168); Crosby 84/85 + 171/170 + Stein Kha. vi.3v1 (ed. Wille 1999, pp. 374ff., frg. 7); Crosby 50/51 + 220/221r4-v2 (ed. Wille 1999, pp. 376f., frg. 8); SHT XI 4392r1-3 (H.143 SA 14; ed. Wille 1996, p. 394, frg. 6.2.2); SHT XI 4444r4

b py utpā(d)[au] .. ///
c ṣmataḥ + ///

msItem.title: Prātimokṣasūtra
Prātimokṣasūtra
msItem.q:
arthiko ’s[my] āyuṣma .[aiyap]. .[yakara] c[ī]va ///
sace [t]. [c cīvara◯m abhiniṣpadye]ta .. ///
catuṣpaṃcaṣa◯[ṭkṛtvaḥpa]ra[maṃ] .. ///
vyaṃ catuṣpaṃcaṣa◯[ṭk]ṛtvaḥpara[maṃ] .. ///
ta cī[v]aram a[bh]i[n]i[ṣpāda]yed i[ty] e + ///

utta[raṃ vyā]yac[ch]e [tasya] cīvarasyābhi .. ///
ced abhini[ṣpā] .. ye[d] yasyā[d]i[śo jña] .. ///
ni tatra svayaṃ ◯ vā[gantav]ya[m ā] + ///
[ṣ]ma[t]ā[asm]ā[n u]◯ddiśya cīvara[ce] .. ///
kaṃcid a[rthaṃ] kurva[ṃ]ti • u[d]yujya[tv āy](u)[ṣm]ā///

Pātimokkha
